offline.title: Device Offline
offline.p1: Make sure the device is now plugged in and switched on.
offline.p2: On your phone, make sure Bluetooth is switched on and all necessary permissions are granted to our app.
offline.p3: Make sure the router works properly and the internet service is available and stable.
offline.p4: If Wi-Fi connection has been configured for the device, make sure the router works properly and the internet service is available and stable.

deviceDetail.sureToUnbind: Are you sure unbind the device?
